mapper.select: SELECT BO_NO, BO_TITLE, BO_WRITER , BO_IP, BO_MAIL, BO_PASS , BO_CONTENT, BO_DATE, BO_HIT , BO_ATCH FROM FREEBOARD WHERE BO_NO = #{boNo}

SELECT BO_NO, BO_TITLE, BO_WRITER , BO_IP, BO_MAIL, BO_PASS , BO_CONTENT, BO_DATE, BO_HIT , BO_ATCH , ATCH_ID, ATCH_SEQ, ATCH_MIME , ATCH_ORGIN_NAME, ATCH_SAVE_NAME, ATCH_SIZE , ATCH_DATE FROM FREEBOARD LEFT OUTER JOIN ATCH_FILE ON (BO_ATCH = ATCH_ID) WHERE BO_NO = #{boNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE FREEBOARD SET BO_HIT = BO_HIT + 1 WHERE BO_NO = #{boNo}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM FREEBOARD WHERE BO_NO = #{boNo} AND BO_PASS = #{boPass}
